document.full_text: a brazilian gunman killed 12 children at a rio de janeiro school and then himself, police said on thursday, shocking the south american nation that has never seen such an incident before.
document.title: brazil gunman kills 12, self at rio school
lines_and_colors: a brazilian gunman killed 12 children at a rio de janeiro school and then himself, police said on thursday, shocking the south american nation that has never seen such an incident before.
